issue.title: [C++] Add benchmark and unittest for PLAIN spaced
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8841](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8841). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create the benchmark and unittest of PLAIN spaced encoding and decoding for future SIMD implementation. Part of https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8579
